name: Pedro Espíndula
whoAmI: I started my journey as Software Engineer by learning Web development and becoming a Fullstack Software Developer. I learned several languages (Python, Go, JavaScript, Java) and worked with different kinds of technologies (NLTK, Cypress, WebSocket). This enabled me to have a broader view of the best solutions for a problem and start to design robust microservices, deal with architectural tradeoffs and identify possible improvements for a system.

In a recent time, I fell in love with Site Reliability Engineering and infrastructure by automating several deployments processes throughout scripting and creating CI/CD pipelines. Along with this passion, my interest in infrastructure as a code, AWS, Docker, Computer Networking, and DevOps arose. Currently, all of my efforts are on improving my SRE skills and on solving challenges regarding it.
